comment: /**  * Create a map with the given key/value pairs  *  * @param strings key/value pairs  * @return Map with the given key/value pairs  */
code: /**  * Create a map with the given key/value pairs  *  * @param strings key/value pairs  * @return Map with the given key/value pairs  */ static Map<String, String> asMap(String... strings) {     if (strings.length % 2 == 1) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot create a map with an add number of strings").     }     Map<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<>(strings.length / 2).     for (int i = 0. i < strings.length. i += 2) {         map.put(strings[i], strings[i + 1]).     }     return map. }
